title: Naupang tete chhandamna thu hriltu an ni thei ang
lyrics:
Naupang tete chhandamna thu hriltu an ni thei ang,
Kan tlantu leh a kraws put chu an hril vel thei ang;
Hla taka mi tam takte rilru chu tilawm turin,
Pathian tan thil pein Baibul an thawn thei a ni.

Naupang tete Chhandamna hriltu an ni thei,
An chhandamtu hmangaihna,
Naupang tete Chhandamna hriltu an ni thei,
Van in khi an kawhhmuh thei.

Naupang teten Lalpa hnaah tihtur pawimawh an nei,
Lungngaihna leh buaina, hlimnain an tireh thei;
Thinlung ngui leh chau tak, lungngaia rumte hnenah chuan,
Ni eng mawi tak angin thu ngilnei tak ansawi thei.

Naupang tete Chhandamtu thutiamah an tel si a,
A khawngaihna, malsawmna chu an chang thuai thei ang;
Anmahni chu ngun takin a veng fo thin a, vana
An vantirhkohten Pa hmel an hmu fo tih min hrilh.
